title: Super Friends Team Up
concept_prompt: A team of young heroes in red, blue, and green suits learning to share their toys and help each other.

title: The Missing Shield
concept_prompt: A hero with a star-spangled shield searches the city for his lost equipment, meeting friends along the way.

title: Guardians of the Garden
concept_prompt: A team of tiny high-tech heroes protects a beautiful garden from robotic pests.

title: The Siege of Tomorrow City
concept_prompt: A sophisticated team of high-tech heroes must stop an alien invasion using teamwork and advanced technology.

title: The Sparkly Tiara
concept_prompt: A kind girl in a blue dress finds a sparkly tiara and shares it with her forest friends.

title: The Underwater Ball
concept_prompt: A mermaid princess prepares a grand party for all the sea creatures in her coral castle.

title: The Enchanted Library
concept_prompt: A brave girl who loves books discovers a magical library where stories come to life.

title: The Quest for the Eternal Rose
concept_prompt: A resourceful princess journeys across frozen mountains to find a magical flower that can save her kingdom.

title: Monkey's Magic Cloud
concept_prompt: A playful monkey jumps on a fluffy yellow cloud and flies over the mountains.

title: The Peach Thief
concept_prompt: A mischievous monkey finds a garden of giant peaches and uses his transformations to hide from the guards.

title: The Staff and the Dragon
concept_prompt: Wukong travels to the bottom of the sea to claim a magical growing staff from the Dragon King.

title: The Battle of the Fiery Mountains
concept_prompt: Wukong and his companions face the challenges of the Flaming Mountains and the formidable Iron Fan Princess.

title: Blue Car Goes Fast
concept_prompt: A bright blue racing car zooms along an orange track, going up and down.

title: The Giant Loop-de-Loop
concept_prompt: Two racing cars compete to see who can make it through the biggest loop in the city.

title: Mega-Track Rescue
concept_prompt: A team of special racing cars must navigate a dangerous obstacle course to deliver a secret package.

title: The Gravity-Defying Grand Prix
concept_prompt: Engineers and drivers compete in a high-stakes race where cars must use physics and speed to win.

title: The Friendly T-Rex
concept_prompt: A big green dinosaur with a loud roar looks for his friends in the jungle.

title: Dino Egg Hunt
concept_prompt: A mother Triceratops searches for her missing egg among the giant ferns.

title: A Day in the Triassic
concept_prompt: Explore the world when the first dinosaurs appeared and see how they lived.

title: The Great Extinction Mystery
concept_prompt: Scientists study the clues left behind to solve the mystery of why the dinosaurs disappeared.

title: The Great Wall
concept_prompt: A very long wall made of big stones that winds like a dragon over the hills.

title: The Emperor's New Clothes
concept_prompt: The story of the beautiful silk robes worn by the ancient kings of China.

title: The Invention of Paper
concept_prompt: Follow the story of Cai Lun and how he discovered a way to make paper for everyone to use.

title: The Silk Road Adventure
concept_prompt: A merchant's long journey across deserts and mountains to trade silk and spices with distant lands.
